verses.verse: ( Israel’s Adultery Rebuked) אִמְר֥וּ <WH559> ’im·rū [“] Say לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <WH251> la·’ă·ḥê·ḵem of your brothers, עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> ‘am·mî ‘ My people, ’ ( Hebrew Ammi) וְלַאֲחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH269> wə·la·’ă·ḥō·w·ṯê·ḵem and of your sisters, רֻחָֽמָה׃ <WH7355> ru·ḥā·māh ‘ My loved one. ’ ( Or Mercy is shown; Hebrew Ruhamah, which means she has received mercy)

פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- Otherwise, אַפְשִׁיטֶ֣נָּה <WH6584> ’ap̄·šî·ṭen·nāh I will strip her עֲרֻמָּ֔ה <WH6174> ‘ă·rum·māh naked וְהִ֨צַּגְתִּ֔יהָ <WH3322> wə·hiṣ·ṣaḡ·tî·hā and expose her כְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> kə·yō·wm like the day הִוָּֽלְדָ֑הּ <WH3205> hiw·wā·lə·ḏāh of her birth. וְשַׂמְתִּ֣יהָ <WH7760> wə·śam·tî·hā I will make her כַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> ḵam·miḏ·bār like a desert וְשַׁתִּ֙הָ֙ <WH7896> wə·šat·ti·hā and turn her into כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> kə·’e·reṣ land, צִיָּ֔ה <WH6723> ṣî·yāh a parched וַהֲמִתִּ֖יהָ <WH4191> wa·hă·mit·tî·hā and I will let her die בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <WH6772> baṣ·ṣā·mā of thirst.
